trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation" /> class contains information about a trust relationship between two <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation" /> contiene información sobre una relación de confianza entre dos objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the excluded top-level names in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los nombres de nivel superior excluidos del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation" />.

trans-unit.source: A read/write <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> that contains the excluded top-level names in the current object.
trans-unit.target: Una colección <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> de lectura y escritura que contiene los nombres de nivel superior excluidos del objeto actual.

trans-unit.source: Commits any changes to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation" /> properties to the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: Confirma los cambios de las propiedades de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation" /> en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: A collision occurred with an existing trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Se produjo una colisión con una relación de confianza existente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the top-level names in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los nombres de nivel superior del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation" />.

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelNameCollection" /> object that contains the top-level names in the current object.
trans-unit.target: Una colección <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelNameCollection" /> de sólo lectura que contiene los nombres de nivel superior del objeto actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the trusted domain information for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la información del dominio de confianza de este objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation" />.

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInfoCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation" /> object for the current object.
trans-unit.target: Sólo lectura <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInfoCollection" /> objeto que contiene el <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation" /> objeto para el objeto actual.
